ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: A futuristic garden featuring massive Supertrees and conservatories filled with diverse plant life. Perfect for nature lovers and those seeking a unique experience.

ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.attraction_name: Marina Bay Sands SkyPark Observation Deck
ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Offers breathtaking panoramic views of Singapore's skyline. Ideal for adventure seekers and photographers.
A historic hilltop park with lush greenery, ancient ruins, and scenic walking trails. Perfect for nature lovers and history buffs.
A UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring a wide variety of plant species and beautiful landscapes. Ideal for a peaceful nature walk.
Offers a range of outdoor activities including hiking trails and a treetop walk. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts and nature lovers.
